short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser into a spooky adventure with Halloween Jinx Live Wallpaper! 🎃👻

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Celebrate the spooky season with the Halloween Jinx Live Wallpaper for your Chrome browser. Every new tab features Jinx in a Halloween-inspired theme, filled with eerie animations and thrilling details. Perfect for fans of adventure and Halloween, this extension offers a fun and secure browsing experience, bringing the magic of Jinx to life in a fast and smooth way.

Features:
🕸️ Halloween-themed Jinx live wallpapers with spooky effects
🌐 Easy access to popular site shortcuts
🔍 Search bar to search with your chosen search engine
📂 Developer info and simple removal options
Embrace the Halloween spirit with Jinx and make every new tab an eerie delight! 👻🎃
